Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Island
public class Island extends Object
Implements the islands in the game, every island has an id and a flag that indicates if the island is conquered or not. idGroup is used when two or more islands connected together. The dimension indicates how many islands are connected together. TowerColor is the color of the tower on the island. Owner is the player that conquers island. presenceMn and oppositeMn are flags that indicate if motherNature is on the island or not and if the island is in the MN's opposite position.

    • block

      private boolean block
      it tells us if the island has been blocked by the block card BlockCardStrategy

    • towerMultiplier

      private int towerMultiplier
      Is the multiplier of the tower influence in influence calculation. It set at 1 by default, and it changes when a player use the special that cancels the effect of towers in the influence calculation. NoTowerInfluenceStrategy

    • towerFinished

      private boolean towerFinished
      It tells us if the tower of the owner is finished

    • addTower

      public void addTower()
      It takes one tower from the owner's dashboard, then it checks that he has towers available, and it adds the tower to the island. If the player hasn't towers available it calls towerFinished and set towerFinished true.

    • towerFinished

      public void towerFinished()
      It sets true if one player finished his tower.

    • getTowerFinished

      public boolean getTowerFinished()
      Returns:
      true if one player finished his tower.

    • addTowerToIsland

      public void addTowerToIsland(Tower tower)
      Adds one tower to the island.
      Parameters:
      tower - is the tower to add.

    • calculateInfluence

      public boolean calculateInfluence(PlayersList players)
      Calculates the influence of each player on the considered island The influence depends on the number of students of one color and also the towers on the island. towerMultiplier is 1 in normal condition and is 0 when a player play a special card that changes the influence of the towers on the island.
      Parameters:
      players - are the players in game.

    • setInfluencePoints

      private void setInfluencePoints(Player p)
      Sets the point of influence of the player considered.
      Parameters:
      p - is the player that we are considering.

    • calcInfluencePoints

      private void calcInfluencePoints(PlayersList playersList)
      Calculates the points of influence of each player, then it assigns the island to respective owner and in that case it adds a tower from owner's dashboard to island.
      Parameters:
      playersList - are the players in game.

    • removePreviousOwnerTower

      private void removePreviousOwnerTower()
      Remove the previous owner's tower when the island changes its owner. When two or more islands are connected together, there are more than one tower on it, so when the island's owner changes, this method with the for loop removes all the towers

    • addMotherNature

      public void addMotherNature()
      Adds Mother Nature to island.

    • getOppositeMN

      public boolean getOppositeMN()
      Returns:
      if the island is the opposite one to the island with Mother Nature.
